presentationTable.name: Facts - Absence Entries
presentationTable.description: A folder containing measures related to absences and gender ratio, worker counts and absence transaction segregated by absence statuses.

presentationColumns.name: Number of Absences
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Entries.Number of Absences

presentationColumns.name: Absence Duration
presentationColumns.description: Absence Duration, non-aggregable at absences plan level.

presentationColumns.name: Withdrawn Absence Transactions
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct absences transaction with absence status as "Withdrawn"
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Entries.Withdrawn Absence Transactions

presentationColumns.name: Rejected Absence Transactions
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct absences transaction with approval status as "Denied"
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Entries.Rejected Absence Transactions

presentationColumns.name: Draft Absence Transactions
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct absences transaction with absence status as "Saved"
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Entries.Draft Absence Transactions

presentationColumns.name: Worker Count (Rejected Absences)
presentationColumns.description: Count distinct worker with absences transactions with approval status as "Denied"
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Entries.Worker Count (Rejected Absences)

presentationColumns.name: Worker Count (Withdrawn Absences)
presentationColumns.description: Count distinct worker With absences transactions with absence status as "Withdrawn"
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Entries.Worker Count (Withdrawn Absences)

presentationColumns.name: Worker Count (Draft Absences)
presentationColumns.description: Count distinct worker with absences transactions with absence status as "Saved"
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Entries.Worker Count (Draft Absences)

presentationColumns.name: Female Gender Ratio (Rejected Absences)
presentationColumns.description: Female gender ratio with rejected absences
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Entries.Female Gender Ratio (Rejected Absences)

presentationColumns.name: Male Gender Ratio (Rejected Absences)
presentationColumns.description: Male gender ratio with rejected absences
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Entries.Male Gender Ratio (Rejected Absences)

presentationColumns.name: Absence Approval Rate for High Performer Worker
presentationColumns.description: Ratio of approved absence to total absence of a worker with performance rating='High'
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Entries.Absence Approval Rate for High Performer Worker

localization.localizationKey: Absence Approval Rate for High Performer Worker

presentationColumns.name: Absence Approval Rate for Low Performer Worker
presentationColumns.description: Ratio of approved absence to total absence of a worker with performance rating='Low'
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Entries.Absence Approval Rate for Low Performer Worker

localization.localizationKey: Absence Approval Rate for Low Performer Worker

presentationColumns.name: Absence Rejection Rate for High Performer Worker
presentationColumns.description: Ratio of rejected absence to total absence of a worker with performance rating='High'
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Absence Entries.Absence Rejection Rate for High Performer Worker
